Analyze.title: Analysis Feature Coming Soon
Analyze.description: Get ready to elevate your game. Our upcoming analysis tool will use a powerful chess engine to review your past games, providing deep insights into your strategy. Discover your blunders, missed opportunities, and brilliant moves to learn faster and play smarter.

Any unauthorized use (in particular reproduction, processing, or distribution) of these copyright-protected contents is therefore prohibited. Footer.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Footer.whatIsChessPieAnswer: ChessPie is the ultimate platform for custom chess. You can design your own board, create custom pieces pixel-by-pixel, and play unique chess variants with friends online.
Footer.isItFreeAnswer: Yes, ChessPie is currently completely free to use. You can play, create, and share without any cost.
Footer.canIPlayFriendsAnswer: Absolutely! Just share your room code or link and play your custom variants instantly in your browser.

Home.title: ChessPie | Play, Create & Share Custom Chess Variants
Home.description: The ultimate platform for custom chess. Create your own chess pieces, design boards, and play unique chess variants online with friends.
Home.p: Design unique chess sets, customize your board, and play multiplayer chess variants online.

Game.title: Play Custom Chess Online | Free Multiplayer | ChessPie
Game.description: Play chess online with friends using custom boards and pieces. Fast, free, and no registration required for quick play.

EditorBoard.title: Chess Board Editor | Design Custom 8x8, 10x10 Boards | ChessPie
EditorBoard.description: Create your own chess board layouts. Customize dimensions, colors, and starting positions. Export or play directly.

EditorPiece.title: Pixel Chess Piece Editor | Create Custom Pieces | ChessPie
EditorPiece.description: Design your own chess pieces with our pixel art editor. Create unique kings, queens, and custom fairy pieces.

Marketplace.title: ChessPie Marketplace | Download Custom Chess Sets
Marketplace.description: Browse and download community-created chess boards and piece sets. Enhance your game with unique designs.

Analyze.title: Analyze Chess Games | Stockfish Analysis | ChessPie
Analyze.description: Analyze your chess games with powerful engines. Improve your strategy and learn from your mistakes.

Login.title: Login to ChessPie | Save Your Creations
Login.description: Log in to ChessPie to save your custom chess boards and pieces, and access your player profile.

Announcements.title: ChessPie News & Announcements
Announcements.description: Stay updated with the latest features, updates, and community news from ChessPie.
